TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ComponentChangedEventHandler(object sender, ComponentChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ComponentChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ComponentChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void ComponentChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type ComponentChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ComponentChangedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). A事件不會在載入或卸載的表單，因為這些作業期間變更符合預期。A event will not occur during the loading or unloading of a form because changes are expected during these operations. ## Examples 此範例示範如何註冊和處理事件。This example demonstrates registering a and handling the event. [!code-cpp[ComponentChangedEventHandlerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentChangedEventHandlerExample/CPP/componentchangedeventhandlerexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ComponentChangedEventHandlerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentChangedEventHandlerExample/CS/componentchangedeventhandlerexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ComponentChangedEventHandlerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentChangedEventHandlerExample/VB/componentchangedeventhandlerexample.vb#1)]
